column1: Master in Robotics and Automation (Distance Learning, 1 Year)
column5: As a society, we have entered an age of digitisation – the fourth industrial revolution, or Industry 4.0. This puts new demands on future engineers. With training central to the development of smart factories, including automation, industry robots and simulation technology, you will be keenly sought after. This one-year programme is taught in virtual environments (distance learning) and all your studies have a close link to industry.WORK INTEGRATED LEARNINGUniversity West is Sweden's leading university when it comes to work-integrated learning (WIL). The university was tasked with the development of WIL by the Swedish government 15+ years ago and continues to lead the field today.
column7: Free application fees for all EU and EEA students  Please see the university website for further information on fees for this course.
